RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JUNE 13, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since April 13 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LAST DROP OF WINE drifted out at the start, was righted and quickly opened a daylight lead, set the pace under a firm hold into the stretch, was put to right handed pressure before the furlong marker, drifted out to the six path when put to left handed urging near mid stretch and won under a strong hand ride. GOOD IDEA chased the winner, drew closer two wide before a half then couldn't keep pace and finished second best in the three path. MASTER OF WAR was in tight at the start, moved up three wide before a half then was outfinished. GEH SCHNELL was no factor. PLATINUM MAC was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Geh Schnell
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Last Drop of Wine
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out start, sprinted clear, nicely rated, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Platinum Mac
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Master of War
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight start, middle move, 3 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Good Idea
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, drew close 2 wide, 1/2 pole, no match for winner,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 14000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 13 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 13 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CUGINE never far back, closed willingly three then four wide, was put to left handed urging near mid stretch and was along in time. SMUDGE THE CAT was hustled along to set the pace until deep stretch, drifted to the five path and couldn't handle the winner. MY TWO AUNT JOANS unhurried early, swung wide and closed ground late in the seven path. THE EQUINEST pressed the pace two wide into the stretch and faded late. FLEET RUN stalked the pace along the inside until mid stretch then gave way. CHOCO ROCO failed to menace. GOTIGER SPECIAL trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Smudge the Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, set pace, hard used, drifted 5path, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Gotiger Special
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Fleet Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, inside, gave way late

ENTRY.NAME: Cugine
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed 4 wide, left handed urging, in time

ENTRY.NAME: My Two Aunt Joans
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, swung wide, late gain 7path

ENTRY.NAME: The Equinest
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Choco Roco
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JUNE 13, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 13 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 13 Allowed 4 lbs. Cla iming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: J J'S FANCY vied for the lead along the rail into the stretch, slipped through to make the lead near the furlong marker, drifted out a bit, was immediately put to right handed urging then shook clear late while continuing to drift out under brisk handling. CONGRATS JENSEN never far back, rallied through the stretch four wide in the five path and finished second best. HIGHLY EXPLOSIVE pressed the pace three wide into the stretch, drew on near even terms for the lead near the furlong marker then was outfinished. CHECK OUT LINE well placed, went evenly five wide in the six path. PISTOL PACKIN BOS away alertly, set the pace off the rail in the two path to mid stretch, was in a bit tight causing her rider to checked then faded. CRISTALINDA was no threat. MY BELLE MICHELLE was no factor. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND AFTER REVIEW UPHELD THE ORIGINAL ORDER OF FINISH.

ENTRY.NAME: J J's Fancy
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied rail, slipped through top lane, drifted out, right urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Congrats Jensen
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally, 4 wide, 5path, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Pistol Packin Bos
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 2path mid stretch, in tight, checked,faded

ENTRY.NAME: My Belle Michelle
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Cristalinda
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Check Out Line
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, evenly, 5 wide, 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Highly Explosive
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, loomed boldly upper stretch, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 16600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE DECEMBER 13 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Ohio Regis tered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CUMBER set the early pace off the rail in the four path, drifted out nearing the far turn gave up the lead near the three eights pole, came on again under right handed urging through deep stretch in the six path and got up in the final strides. DISTORTED LIMITS chased the winner from the five path for four and one half furlongs, angled inside that one and made the lead near the three eighths pole, set the balance of the pace in the five path and just missed hanging on. DISCLOSURE well placed inside rivals, went evenly. OWN THE TOWN settled in the four path, failed to respond. LAZARUS PROJECT failed to menace. ACROSS THE AISLE trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Across the Aisle
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Cumber
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace off rail, dropped back 2nd turn, came again 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Disclosure
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Distorted Limits
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5path, angled in, 3/8pole lead, drifted 5path, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Own the Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4path, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Lazarus Project
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 27500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since April 13 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Pr eferred).

CLAIM.OWNER: Samuel Klein Jr LLC and Enjoy The Ride Stable LLC

RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOUGS MORNING PICK unhurried for five furlongs, rallied inside rivals to engage the leader in upper stretch, dug in under left handed urging and proved best in a stiff drive by a narrow margin. HENRY MAC drifted out at the start, prompted the pace two wide into the far turn, made the lead, set the balance of the pace and just missed hanging on. VISUAL MISSION offered a mild bid three wide on the far turn and into the stretch then leveled off. YOU'RE MY BOY BLUE vied for the lead three wide into the stretch and weakened. SPEEDY MOBILE allowed to settle, drew closer two wide before a half then came up empty. NEBULOSA away alertly, set the pace into the far turn, had speed into the stretch and gave way late. JUST TAPIT IN was in tight at the start and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Henry Mac
ENTRY.OWNER: Thomson Dustin J and Slaughter James
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out start, pressed 2w, led, long drive, just failed

ENTRY.NAME: Just Tapit In
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight start, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Speedy Mobile
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 2 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Dougs Morning Pick
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, rallied inside, long drive, just up, left urging

ENTRY.NAME: You're My Boy Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Nebulosa
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 2nd turn, gave way late

ENTRY.NAME: Visual Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, leveled off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 17900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 13 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 13 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,5 00.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CLIFTONS BALLERINA prompted the early pace, rallied two wide to make the lead midway on the turn, set the balance of the pace and drew clear under right handed urging. HOSANNA set the early pace, chased the winner the balance of the trip, drifted from the five path to the seven path late despite right handed urging bumping MISS ELLIE and held on for second. CAN I GO TOO allowed to settle, swung wide, rallied outside rivals, steadied nearing the wire and just missed getting up for second. CEE CEE'S GOT THIS never far back, finished with good courage two wide. MISS ELLIE forwardly place along the inside, angled out on the turn, closed determinedly in the six path through upper stretch, was bumped and put in tight late causing her rider to check nearing the turn and lost momentum. EASTER PRIDE inside, went evenly. DANCING GRACE hopped at the start and had brief speed. SWEET CHELSEA trailed. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND THE RIDER OF MISS ELLIE LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF HOSANNA FOR INTERFERENCE IN THE STRETECH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS DISQUALIFIED HOSANNA AND PLACED HER FIFTH.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Ellie
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, angled out turn, closed 6path, bumped late, claimed foul

ENTRY.NAME: Cee Cee's Got This
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Easter Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Cliftons Ballerina
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed, rallied 2 wide, turn, drew off, right handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Chelsea
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Hosanna
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace, chased, drifted 5-7path, right urging, bumped late

ENTRY.NAME: Dancing Grace
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Can I Go Too
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, swung wide, late gain widest, steadied late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 80. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 21700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since April 13 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLUSHING BETTY with the near the inside, rallied three wide through the far turn to make the lead at the top of the stretch and drew off late under strong handling. KINGSTON TIME pressed the pace two wide and finished clear for second. BLAZING ZENNA was in tight between rivals shortly after the start, settled, swung wide and passed tiring rivals in the middle of the racetrack. LIBERTY BELLE set the pace along the inside for six furlongs, shifted out to the four path at the top of the stretch then weakened while continuing to drift out. ANNMARIA with the second flight two wide, weakened on the second turn. SWEET QUEEN BEE was fractious in the gate and failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Liberty Belle
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside 1/4p, altered 4path, drifted, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Kingston Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2 wide, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Blazing Zenna
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight start, swung wide, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Annmaria
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, weakened 2nd turn,

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Queen Bee
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious in gate, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Blushing Betty
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, rallied 3 wide 2nd turn, going away,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JUNE 13, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 13 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 13 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price$7,500.$ 7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RONNI'S STORM away alertly, opened a clear lead soon after the start, set all the pace unchallenged and won as much the best while drifting out to the six path under right handed urging. TIGER TRAIL settled, moved up three wide into the stretch, drifted out to the middle of the racetrack and finished second best. ACCURATE was bumped and squeezed at the start, saved ground and finished with good courage. THE MAN CAN was bumped at the start, swung wide and lacked the needed response. FOREIGN bore out at the start bumping rivals, chased the winner through the turn then weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Ronni's Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, clear lead, unchallenged, drifted, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Foreign
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out, bumped start, chased, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Accurate
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, squeezed start, saved ground,

ENTRY.NAME: The Man Can
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, swung wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Tiger Trail
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, drifted mid track, second best,
